pages.text: $(li)The Sponge is a placeable block that can be found inside of the $(l:patchouli:structures/ocean_monument)Ocean Monuments$(/l) or be dropped by an $(l:patchouli:bosses/elder_guardian)Elder Guardian$(/l) .$(br)$(li)Just place this block and it will absorb near water blocks.$(br)$(li)This block will turn into a $(l)Wet Sponge$() which will not be able to absorb near water.
$(li)You can smelt it in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l) to recover back your $(l)Sponge$().
